amendment.description: An amendment numbered 68 printed in Part B of House Report 116-16 to require the Director of National Intelligence to provide state election officials and Congress an assessment regarding risks and threats to election infrastructure 180 days before a general election.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Spanberger amendment (A050) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Spanberger amendment (A050) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A050) offered by Ms. Spanberger.
